# WARNING - DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE, IT IS MACHINE GENERATED
#           To change something here, edit tools/makeboards.py and
#           run 'python3 makeboards.py > ../boards.txt' to regenerate

menu.BoardModel=Model
menu.flash=Flash Size
menu.freq=CPU Speed
menu.opt=Optimize
menu.rtti=RTTI
menu.stackprotect=Stack Protector
menu.exceptions=C++ Exceptions

menu.dbglvl=Debug Level
menu.boot2=Boot Stage 2
menu.wificountry=WiFi Region
menu.usbstack=USB Stack
menu.ipbtstack=IP/Bluetooth Stack
menu.uploadmethod=Upload Method

# CONTROLLINO NEO Core
# -----------------------------------

controllino_neo_core.vid.0=0x2e8a
controllino_neo_core.pid.0=0xf00a
controllino_neo_core.vid.1=0x2e8a
controllino_neo_core.pid.1=0xf10a
controllino_neo_core.vid.2=0x2e8a
controllino_neo_core.pid.2=0xf00a
controllino_neo_core.vid.3=0x2e8a
controllino_neo_core.pid.3=0xf10a
controllino_neo_core.vid.4=0x2e8a
controllino_neo_core.pid.4=0xf00a
controllino_neo_core.vid.5=0x2e8a
controllino_neo_core.pid.5=0xf10a
controllino_neo_core.vid.6=0x2e8a
controllino_neo_core.pid.6=0xf00a
controllino_neo_core.vid.7=0x2e8a
controllino_neo_core.pid.7=0xf10a
controllino_neo_core.build.usbvid=-DUSBD_VID=0x2e8a
controllino_neo_core.build.usbpid=-DUSBD_PID=0xf00a
controllino_neo_core.build.usbpwr=-DUSBD_MAX_POWER_MA=500
controllino_neo_core.build.board=CONTROLLINO_NEO_CORE
controllino_neo_core.build.mcu=cortex-m0plus
controllino_neo_core.build.variant=controllino_neo_core
controllino_neo_core.upload.maximum_size=16777216
controllino_neo_core.upload.wait_for_upload_port=true
controllino_neo_core.upload.erase_cmd=

controllino_neo_core.serial.disableRTS=false

controllino_neo_core.build.core=rp2040
controllino_neo_core.build.ldscript=memmap_default.ld
